name: Doom of Icewind Dale - few questions.
author: Shifter4Nature

posts.author: Shifter4Nature
posts.content: Hey, I'm just starting my adventure with this module, and I'm curious if it's worth investing in skills like Spot, Listen, or Search. Do they, like in OC, not affect gameplay? What is the character level at the end of the module? Are there any special class interactions?
